name: Compression - large JSON response
description: Tests compression of large JSON response with high compression ratio due to text redundancy

source.test_case: Large JSON payload with high compression efficiency

body.records: Array of 1000+ JSON objects with repeated structure

notes: JSON responses compress extremely well (often 6-10x) due to repeated structure and field names. Brotli's dictionary compression excels at this. Critical for API performance at scale.
